item.title: “Innovation… At The Highest Level Possible”: Christopher Nolan Confirms His Next Movie Will Test New IMAX Technology
item.description: Christopher Nolan teases his next film and the new IMAX technology that he will be using to bring his vision to life after the success of Oppenheimer.

item.title: Will Kraven The Hunter 2 Happen? Everything We Know
item.description: Sony might decide to follow up Kraven the Hunter with a sequel so here is everything we know about the possible future of Kraven in live-action.

item.title: 7 Years After Avengers: Endgame, Marvel Has The Opportunity To Pay Off One Of The MCU Movie's Best Comics' References
item.description: 7 years later, the MCU has the perfect opportunity to pay off one of Avengers: Endgame's best references to the original comics in Avengers: Doomsday.
